description:
Stytra stimuli and analysis notebooks for Xiao et al, 2022.

Consult the README.md or the GitHub repo https://github.com/portugueslab/xiao_et_al to find the instructions for running the code.
title: Xiao et al, Oligodendrocyte Precursor Cells Sculpt the Visual System by Regulating Axonal Remodeling [Dataset]
